author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Some additional tests that are remoting specific based on code coverage

Part of https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/4161

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT can you please add `[feature]` tag and trigger the feature test run? The full build triggered by the first commit failed.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
@SteveL-MSFT there is one failure in the new tests. Please fix the test.
```
Describing Remote module tests
VERBOSE: Using Global AppVeyor Credential
VERBOSE: Using Global AppVeyor Credential
 [-] Error occurred in Describe block 425ms
   Method not found: 'Void System.Security.SecureStringMarshal.ZeroFreeCoTaskMemUnicode(IntPtr)'.
   At C:\projects\powershell\test\tools\Modules\HelpersRemoting\HelpersRemoting.psm1:66 char:20
```
Please also include `[Feature]` tag when submitting new commits.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @daxian-dbw that api doesn't exist in our sources.  I suspect it's in MI.dll.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT the error seems to be caused by `$cimsession = New-RemoteSession -CimSession`. It's thrown from `HelpersRemoting.psm1`. It possibly reveals a code bug.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: I'm pretty sure it's a product issue.  However, it's likely an issue with mi.dll.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Can you please open an issue with a simple repro step? The tests that require `$CimSession` need to be marked pending.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: There are 2 test failurs in AppVeryor test run. Can you please fix them?

title: Added tests for Get-Module over remoting
